data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Can Busan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 4, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 7, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 9, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Free kick Seongnam.
Yu In-soo of Seongnam gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Busan's Kwon Hyeok-kyu misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam just outside Busan's area.
In the minute 19, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Seongnam surge into the attack at Tancheon Sports Complex but Yang Dong-hyeonâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Busan.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Busan.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Lee Tae-heui's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Busan's Park Jong-woo breaks free at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Busan's half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 30, Busan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Busan.
In Seongnam, Yang Dong-hyeon of Seongnam is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 34, Dostonbek Tursunov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Yang Dong-hyeon hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Seongnam!
Free kick for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 36, Dostonbek Tursunov is back on the pitch.
Busan have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Busan throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lee Jung-hyub for Busan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Busan's Lee Jung-hyub looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Busan.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Busan.
The first-half has ended.
Jong Hyeok Kim has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 46, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Seongnam make their first substitution with Kim Hyeon-seong replacing Jamshid Iskanderov.
Seongnam are coming forward and Na Sangho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Busan drives forward and Lee Jung-hyub gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Busan's half.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 58, Na Sangho for Seongnam drives towards goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In Seongnam Seongnam drive forward through Yang Dong-hyeon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 60, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Kim Hyeon-seong (Seongnam) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Duk-Jae Cho (Busan) is making a first substitution, with Kim Byong-oh replacing Kwon Hyeok-kyu.
Goal! Yu In-soo gives Seongnam a 1-0 lead in Seongnam.
In the minute 61, That's a fine assist from Kim Hyeon-seong.
Throw-in for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Busan.
The away team have replaced Lee Jung-hyub with Gustavo Vintecinco. This is the second substitution made today by Duk-Jae Cho.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 66, Seongnam's Lee Tae-heui gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Busan defender.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 68, Seongnam's Kim Hyeon-seong is whistled for offside at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Busan's Gustavo Vintecinco is on target but unsuccessful.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Busan.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Busan.
In the minute 72, Free kick Busan.
Throw-in Busan.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Seongnam are in shooting range from this free kick.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 76, Seongnam attack but Lee Chang-yong's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Busan at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Kim Ho-jun is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Yang Dong-hyeon with Tomislav Kis.
Busanâ€™s Kim Ho-jun is on his feet again at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Busan.
In the minute 83, Kim Moon-hwan (Busan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Park Tae-jun has recovered and rejoins the match in Seongnam.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seongnam to check on Park Tae-jun, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 85, Seongnam push forward at Tancheon Sports Complex and Yeon Je-un gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Busan defence.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Kim Hyeon-seong (Seongnam) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Busan have a goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Busan.
Corner awarded to Busan.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seongnam are on the attack at Tancheon Sports Complex, where Tomislav Kis is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Dostonbek Tursunov.
Park Jong-woo with an assist there.
Ahn Yeong-kyu is on a sub for Lee Chang-yong for Seongnam.
